attributes.status: Active'''Heartsbane''' is the Valyrian steel blade of House Tarly.<ref>"Valyrian Steel (Histories & Lore)"</ref>== In the books ==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Heartsbane has been in the possession of House Tarly for five hundred years. Like Ice, it is a two-handed greatsword.  It is currently wielded by Lord Randyll Tarly. == See also ==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)== References ==ReflistCategory:House TarlyCategory:SwordsCategory:Valyrian steel blades
